summary: Updated geolocation service documentation to reflect MaxMind GeoLite2 database implementation (replaced ip-api.com). Added comprehensive JSDoc comments to all functions in geolocation.ts with examples and detailed parameter/return documentation.
changes_made: Updated geolocation-service.md: Changed all references from ip-api.com to MaxMind GeoLite2 database
Updated state machine and data flow diagrams to reflect local database queries instead of API calls
Updated edge cases to reflect database lookup scenarios instead of API rate limits
Updated performance metrics: replaced API rate limit concerns with local database performance
Added references to setup documentation (SETUP.md) and setup script
Updated code references section with new MaxMind-specific functions (initReader, getDbPath)
Added open questions about database updates and deployment setup
Enhanced JSDoc for getDbPath() with environment variable override documentation
Enhanced JSDoc for initReader() with singleton pattern and caching behavior details
Enhanced JSDoc for getLocationFromIP() with comprehensive examples and caching behavior
Enhanced JSDoc for isPrivateIP() with IP range specifications and examples
Enhanced JSDoc for getClientIP() with proxy header precedence and multi-hop behavior
